property.name: data.source.description
property.value: XML file listing each InterPro entry.

property.name: data.source.description
property.value: Mappings of InterPro entries to Gene Ontology (GO) terms.

property.name: obo.ontology.name
property.value: Plant Ontology

property.name: obo.ontology.description
property.value: The Plant Ontology (PO) is a community resource consisting of standardized terms, definitions, and logical relations describing plant structures and development stages, augmented by a large database of annotations from genomic and phenomic studies.

property.name: obo.ontology.name
property.value: Plant Trait Ontology

property.name: obo.ontology.description
property.value: A controlled vocabulary of describe phenotypic traits in plants.

property.name: data.set.description
property.value: LIS gene families

property.name: desired.organisms
property.value: aradu araip arahy arath cajca cicar cucsa glyma glyso lotja lupan medtr phalu phavu prupe solly tripr vigan vigra vigun vitvi

property.name: obo.ontology.name
property.value: Common Bean Crop Ontology

property.name: obo.ontology.description
property.value: A controlled vocabulary to describe crop traits in common bean.

property.name: obo.ontology.name
property.value: Chickpea Crop Ontology

property.name: obo.ontology.description
property.value: A controlled vocabulary to describe crop traits in chickpea.

property.name: obo.ontology.name
property.value: Cowpea Crop Ontology

property.name: obo.ontology.description
property.value: A controlled vocabulary to describe crop traits in cowpea.

property.name: obo.ontology.name
property.value: Soybean Crop Ontology

property.name: obo.ontology.description
property.value: A controlled vocabulary to describe crop traits in soybean.

property.name: obo.ontology.name
property.value: Soybean Growth and Trait Ontology V3.0 revision 1.0

property.name: obo.ontology.description
property.value: Currently, there are 4 divisions to SOY terms, soybean structural terms (Soybean Structure Ontology), developmental stages (Soybean Developmental Ontology), whole plant development terms (Soybean Whole Plant Growth Stages) and trait terms (Soybean Trait Ontology).

property.name: obo.ontology.name
property.value: Mungbean Crop Ontology

property.name: obo.ontology.description
property.value: A controlled vocabulary to describe crop traits in mungbean.
